mapper.select: SELECT usc.id AS shop_car_id, usc.product_id, usc.sku_id, usc.count, ps.sku_count, ps.sku_price, ps.sku_rate, ps.sku_name FROM djmall_shop_car usc LEFT JOIN djmall_product_sku ps ON usc.sku_id = ps.id LEFT JOIN djmall_mall_product p ON ps.product_id = p.id WHERE usc.user_id = #{id} AND usc.check_status = 1
